00017 void t_tool_addparticles::paint()
00018 {
00019     t_particles *particles= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->particles;
00020     vec spd(smoothedmousedelta);
00021     spd.mul(5);
00022     float radius= editor->getbrush()->getwidth()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5;
00023     while(amountleft>0)
00024     {
00025         vec pos(lerpedmousepos);
00026         pos.random_deviation(radius);
00027         t_particle p= { pos, 0, spd };
00028         particles->add(p);
00029         amountleft-= 1.0;
00030     }
00031     amountleft= amount+amountleft;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void t_tool_addparticles::erase()
00035 {
00036     if(amountleft<=0) return;
00037     
00038     t_particles *particles= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->particles;
00039     float radius= editor->getbrush()->getwidth()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5;
00040     for(int i= particles->particles.size()-1; i>=0; i--)
00041     {
00042         vec d= particles->particles[i].pos; d.sub(lerpedmousepos);
00043         if(d.squaredlen()<radius*radius)
00044         {
00045             //~ t_particles::t_particlecontainer::iterator it= particles->particles.begin();
00046             //~ it+= i;
00047             //~ particles->particles.erase( it );
00048             particles->particles.remove(i);
00049             amountleft-= 1.0;
00050             if(amountleft<=0) break;
00051         }
00052     }
00053     if(amountleft<=0) amountleft= amount*0.5-amountleft;
00054 }

00056 
00057 void t_tool_addparticles::phys_tick(float time)
00058 {
00059     t_editortool::phys_tick(time);
00060     if(mouse_buttons&(SDL_BUTTON(1)))
00061         paint();
00062     else if(mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(3))
00063         erase();
00064 }

00071 void t_tool_push::mousepaint()
00072 {
00073     t_grid *grid= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->grid;
00074     t_brush *brush= editor->getbrush();
00075     vec pos(lerpedmousepos.x - brush->getwidth()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5, lerpedmousepos.y - brush->getheight()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5);
00076     grid->paint_pixels_additive( pos.mul(1.0/GRIDGRANULARITY), brush->getpixels(), brush->getwidth(), brush->getheight(), mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(1)? intensity: -intensity );
00077 }
00078 
00079 void t_tool_push::mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00080 {
00081     t_editortool::mouse_button_event(evt);
00082     if(mouse_buttons&(SDL_BUTTON(1)|SDL_BUTTON(3))) mousepaint();
00083 }

00085 void t_tool_push::mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &evt)
00086 {
00087     t_editortool::mouse_motion_event(evt);
